channel.title: Urgent! anybody selling an axoloti core?
channel.description:
Hi there,
I just blew up my axolotl core. Don't ask..... Problem is I have a film shooting of a livest with my music project for a festival next Friday and I desperately need an Axolotl core for that. Otherwise I can't play. Is there anybody around who would sell me their board ???? I am based in Berlin and I have to have it before Friday obviously. Or is there maybe someone in Berlin with an Axolotl who could led me a board?
If you can help. Please get in touch.

item.title: Urgent! anybody selling an axoloti core?
item.dc:creator: @Blindsmyth Simon
item.description:
@Blindsmyth wrote:

Heyho yes I'm Berlin based Happy to hear it worked out already. Send us a link of your performance when its out good luck!

Read full topic
item.source: Urgent! anybody selling an axoloti core?

item.title: Urgent! anybody selling an axoloti core?
item.dc:creator: @haK Norbert Wuertz
item.description:
@haK wrote:

Hey everybody! Thank you so much for your help and kind offerings. Luckily we already found a board this morning. So we are all honky dory and really hope disaster won't strike again.

All the best
cheers

Read full topic
